However, considering that teams usually play their opponents both at home and away during a season, it seems unlikely for the last two games to be home games if all previous games have been away games (which is not the case as there are wins recorded).

3. Check the results of the last 2 games: To check if these were wins, we can look at the "result" column in the table for games 15 and 16. If the result shows a 'W' for either of these two games, it would mean that our claim is false because there was at least one win during the last two games.
